mapper.select: SELECT id,loginid,password,lastname, sex,telephone,mobile,email, startdate,enddate,jobtitle,seclevel, departmentid,subcompanyid1,costcenterid, managerid,assistantid,resourceimageid, createrid,createdate,lastmodid, workcode, managerstr,status,probationenddate, passwdchgdate,dsporder,accounttype, belongto,dactylogram,assistantdactylogram, pinyinlastname,mobileshowtype,ecology_pinyin_search FROM HrmResource

SELECT id,loginid,password,lastname, sex,telephone,mobile,email, startdate,enddate,jobtitle,seclevel, departmentid,subcompanyid1,costcenterid, managerid,assistantid,resourceimageid, createrid,createdate,lastmodid, workcode, managerstr,status,probationenddate, passwdchgdate,dsporder,accounttype, belongto,dactylogram,assistantdactylogram, pinyinlastname,mobileshowtype,ecology_pinyin_search FROM HrmResource
mapper.insert:
insert into HrmResource (id, loginid, password, lastname, sex, telephone, mobile, email, startdate, enddate, jobtitle, seclevel, departmentid, subcompanyid1, costcenterid, managerid, assistantid, resourceimageid, createrid, createdate, lastmodid, lastmoddate, lastlogindate, workcode, managerstr, status, probationenddate, passwdchgdate, dsporder, accounttype, belongto, dactylogram, assistantdactylogram, pinyinlastname, mobileshowtype, ecology_pinyin_search) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.loginid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.startdate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.enddate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.jobtitle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.seclevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.departmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.subcompanyid1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.costcenterid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.managerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.assistantid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.resourceimageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createrid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createdate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.lastmodid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lastmoddate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.lastlogindate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.workcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.managerstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.probationenddate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.passwdchgdate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.dsporder,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.accounttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.belongto,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dactylogram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assistantdactylogram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pinyinlastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mobileshowtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.ecologyPinyinSearch,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into HrmResource (id, loginid, password, lastname, sex, telephone, mobile, email, startdate, enddate, jobtitle, seclevel, departmentid, subcompanyid1, costcenterid, managerid, assistantid, resourceimageid, createrid, createdate, lastmodid, lastmoddate, lastlogindate, workcode, managerstr, status, probationenddate, passwdchgdate, dsporder, accounttype, belongto, dactylogram, assistantdactylogram, pinyinlastname, mobileshowtype, ecology_pinyin_search) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.loginid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.startdate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.enddate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.jobtitle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.seclevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.departmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.subcompanyid1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.costcenterid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.managerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.assistantid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.resourceimageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createrid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createdate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.lastmodid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lastmoddate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.lastlogindate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.workcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.managerstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.probationenddate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.passwdchgdate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.dsporder,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.accounttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.belongto,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dactylogram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assistantdactylogram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pinyinlastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mobileshowtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.ecologyPinyinSearch,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT hr.id,hr.loginid,hr.password,hr.lastname,hr.sex,hr.telephone,hr.mobile,hr.email,hr.status,hd.imid as imdid,hd.subcompanyid1,hr.seclevel,hr.dsporder FROM HrmResource hr LEFT JOIN HrmDepartment hd ON hr.departmentid = hd.id WHERE (hr.imsyncflag IS NULL OR hr.imsyncflag = 0) AND hr.status IN (0,1,2,3) AND hd.imid IS NOT NULL

SELECT hr.id,hr.loginid,hr.password,hr.lastname,hr.sex,hr.telephone,hr.mobile,hr.email,hr.status,hd.txid as txdid,hd.subcompanyid1,hr.seclevel,hr.dsporder FROM HrmResource hr LEFT JOIN HrmDepartment hd ON hr.departmentid = hd.id WHERE (hr.txsyncflag IS NULL OR hr.txsyncflag = 0) AND hr.status IN (0,1,2,3) AND hd.txid IS NOT NULL

SELECT hr.id,hr.imid,hr.loginid,hr.password,hr.lastname,hr.sex,hr.telephone,hr.mobile,hr.email,hr.status,hd.imid as imdid,hd.subcompanyid1 FROM HrmResource hr LEFT JOIN HrmDepartment hd ON hr.departmentid = hd.id WHERE hr.imsyncflag = 1 AND hr.imid IS NOT NULL

SELECT hr.id,hr.txid,hr.loginid,hr.password,hr.lastname,hr.sex,hr.telephone,hr.mobile,hr.email,hr.status,hd.txid as txdid,hd.subcompanyid1 FROM HrmResource hr LEFT JOIN HrmDepartment hd ON hr.departmentid = hd.id WHERE hr.txsyncflag = 1 AND hr.txid IS NOT NULL
mapper.update:
update HrmResource
imsyncflag = #{imsyncflag},
imcreatetime = #{imcreatetime},
immodifytime = #{immodifytime},
imid = #{imid},
where id = #{id}

update HrmResource
txsyncflag = #{txsyncflag},
txcreatetime = #{txcreatetime},
txmodifytime = #{txmodifytime},
txid = #{txid},
where email = #{email}
